subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में कौन सा फोट है?
C_hi: सवाई जयंसिंग की चित्रों के लिए
explanation_en:
Hawa Mahal is a famous landmark located in Jaipur, known for its unique design and architecture.
Hawa Mahal, which means 'Palace of Winds', was built by Maharaja Sawai Pratap Singh in 1592 AD.
explanation_hi: जयंतीय सवाई जयंसिंग के लिए बनने की शामियों के लिए

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which kingdom was established by Chauhan Rajput in 10th century?
explanation_en: Jodha, a nobleman from the Rathore clan, established the kingdom of Rajasthan in the 15th century.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा, एक राव शलाबाजा दिल, 15वेंचर के लिए राज्य ने 15वेंचर के लिए राज्य ने बना की तथा प्राक्षर ने बना
explanation_en: Rao Jodha, a nobleman from the Rathore clan, established the kingdom of Rajasthan in the 15th century.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा, रात्रोदेसर के शलाबाजाओं ने बना
